thread.title: Juventus to rival Premier League clubs for Moussa Dembele? Transfer news and gossip from Saturday's papers
thread.title_full: Juventus to rival Premier League clubs for Moussa Dembele? Transfer news and gossip from Saturday's papers

author: Football Spy
title: Juventus to rival Premier League clubs for Moussa Dembele? Transfer news and gossip from Saturday's papers
text:
Juventus to rival Premier League clubs for Moussa Dembele? Transfer news and gossip from Saturday's papers PLUS: Sam Allardyce is keen to make Mamadou Sakho's loan deal at Selhurst Park permanent Share Celtic's Moussa Dembele (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Share Get football   Thank you for subscribing!   
The race for Moussa Dembele appears to be hotting up with Juventus rumoured to have entered the fray. 
Chelsea, Tottenham and Liverpool have all shown an interest in the Celtic striker and now reports in Italy say the Serie A champions are also keen. 
Dembele moved to Glasgow on a free transfer last summer and has since notched up a staggering 32 goals in 45 appearances. 
But what other transfer lines are there in Saturday's papers? Here is our round-up of all the best stories... Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
